pullRequest.title: [ServiceBus] T2 Document Runtime Exception in public API
pullRequest.bodyText:
Document RuntimeExceptions in public API
fixes #11379

nodes.bodyText: Update all other settlement methods to match the verbiage in this method's javadoc.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -195,7 +195,10 @@ public String getEntityPath() {
      * @return A {@link Mono} that completes when the Service Bus abandon operation completes.
      * @throws NullPointerException if {@code message} is null.
      * @throws UnsupportedOperationException if the receiver was opened in
-     *     {@link ServiceBusReceiveMode#RECEIVE_AND_DELETE} mode or if the message was received from peekMessage.
+     *     {@link ServiceBusReceiveMode#RECEIVE_AND_DELETE} mode or if the message was received from
+     *     {@link ServiceBusReceiverAsyncClient#peekMessage() peekMessage}.

nodes.bodyText:
Make the changes in other places too.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                 * @throws IllegalArgumentException if message is already been settled.
          
          
            
                 * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the message is already settled.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -220,6 +223,8 @@ public String getEntityPath() {
      *     {@code transactionContext.transactionId} is null when {@code options.transactionContext} is specified.
      * @throws UnsupportedOperationException if the receiver was opened in
      *     {@link ServiceBusReceiveMode#RECEIVE_AND_DELETE} mode or if the message was received from peekMessage.
+     * @throws IllegalStateException if receiver is already disposed.
+     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if message is already been settled.

@@ -808,6 +853,7 @@ public String getEntityPath() {
      *
      * @return The next expiration time for the session lock.
      * @throws IllegalStateException if the receiver is a non-session receiver.
+     * @throws IllegalStateException if receiver is already disposed.

nodes.bodyText: Don't we wrap this AmqpException with ServiceBusException for this error?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -185,6 +188,7 @@ public String getEntityPath() {
      * @throws NullPointerException if {@code batch}, {@code transactionContext} or
      * {@code transactionContext.transactionID} is {@code null}.
      * @throws AmqpException if {@code messages} is larger than the maximum allowed size of a single batch.

nodes.bodyText: Can this string also be added to Message.java class along with all other error messages?
